alert.note: Alert for Kittitas (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 4:28PM PDT until May 18 at 4:45PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM PDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KITTITAS COUNTY... At 427 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Easton, or 12 miles southeast of Snoqualmie Pass, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Kittitas County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Pendleton Oregon.
